name: Trader Jack’s - Kickin’ Cigars Midnight
additionalNotes:
Today, J.C. Newman is the last working cigar factory in Cigar City, USA. Different from other factories, our machine-assisted cigars are manned by skilled cigar makers. Many of the dedicated cigar makers have been with J.C. Newman for twenty years or more, perfecting their craft and making the 
Trader Jacks’ Sunrise and Midnight varieties consist of two distinct cigars with delectable blends that feature Dominican, Honduran, and Nicaraguan tobaccos. Trader Jacks’ Sunrise is enfolded in a smooth Connecticut shade wrapper reminiscent of dawn’s first light, while Trader Jacks’ Midnight is cloaked in a tasty Connecticut Broadleaf Maduro wrapper as dark as the midnight sea.
